description: Get all your favourite Walter Cronkite quotes in this one handy app! With a huge number of quotes, you will always be able to enjoy new sayings and messages while you're on the go! Walter Cronkite Quotes offers a simple and intuitive interface. Simply tap or shake your Palm device and a new phrase is displayed. You can also view all the quotes in a scrollable list. It's great if you're searching for one particular quote. Whichever way you choose to view, you'll be able to easily access a great collection of quotes! If you truly enjoy the words of Walter Cronkite, you owe it to yourself to download Walter Cronkite Quotes today!
